entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
